mapper.select: select * from member where memEmail=#{memEmail} AND memPw= #{memPw}

insert.if: INSERT INTO member(mememail, mempw, memnick, memphone) VALUES(#{memEmail}, #{memPw}, #{memNick},#{memPhone})

INSERT INTO member(mememail, mempw, memphone, memteamtype, memteamname, memvideo, memdetail, memstatus, memtype) VALUES(#{memEmail}, #{memPw}, #{memPhone}, #{memTeamType}, #{memTeamName}, #{memVideo}, #{memDetail}, #{memStatus}, #{memType})
